```{r}
library(vip)
tree_final %>% 
      fit(Master_Training) %>%
      extract_fit_parsnip() %>%
      vi(accuracy = best_param_tree) %>%
      mutate(Importance = abs(Importance),
             Variable = fct_reorder(Variable, Importance)) %>%
     ggplot(aes(x = Importance, y = Variable)) +
     geom_col() + 
     scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0,0)) +
     labs(y = NULL)
```
